answers.question: Question 1
answers.answer: To place an order, manually catalog the items you wish to purchase and send an email to abcd@project.com detailing your desired products. This will initiate the purchase process.

answers.question: Question 2
answers.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on products, provided that the items are returned in their original condition and have not been used. Please contact our support team for a return authorization and further instructions on how to send back the products
